Detailed Description

Request for starting a session cleanup.

Inactive sessions are moved to history, or removed. WARNING: All old sessions are moved, this can take a while...

{tabular}{lll} Pos & Size & Destription \ USER_REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE & 2 bytes & sessionID strlen \ +2 & 2 bytes & sessionKey strlen \ & string & sessionID \ & string & sessionKey \ {tabular}
